name: sample-docs
description: ## Goals 1. Create a simple content site that can be used to test essential features of docsotron. 1. Add enough complexity to represent all the features of a docs site while keeping things small, well explained, and clean. 1. Show best practices. 1. During transition to the new system allow this site to be build both as a nanoc/nanoc-conref-fs site and a docsotron site so we have a point of truth.
